thread.title: Kristen Stewart Drops the F-Bomb in SNL Monologue: ‘Coolest F*cking Thing Ever’
thread.title_full: Kristen Stewart Drops the F-Bomb in SNL Monologue: ‘Coolest F*cking Thing Ever’

author: J.D. Durkin
title: Kristen Stewart Drops the F-Bomb in SNL Monologue: ‘Coolest F*cking Thing Ever’
text:
Kristen Stewart Drops the F-Bomb in SNL Monologue: ‘Coolest F*cking Thing Ever’ by J.D. Durkin | 11:47   video 
This is probably not how Kristen Stewart expected her first ever SNL monologue to go. 
The 26-year-old ended her monologue on stage at Studio 8-H by letting slip that hosting the venerable late night show was, “the coolest fucking thing ever.” 
“K-Stew” as the cool kids call her immediately caught herself — as did two SNL regulars, Aidy Bryant and Kate McKinnon, who were on-stage with her at the time of the slip-up. Their reactions said it all. 
She quickly regained her composure however and jokingly told the crowd she would never be invited back. Watch above via NBC.—
